m:MaterialTitle.title: Material Box
m:MaterialTitle.description: Material box is a material design implementation of the Lightbox plugin. When a user clicks on an image that can be enlarged. Material box centers the image and enlarges it in a smooth, non-jarring manner. To dismiss the image, the user can either click on the image again, scroll away, or press the ESC key.

m:MaterialTitle.title: Captions
m:MaterialTitle.description: It is very easy to add a short caption to your photo. Just add the caption as a caption attribute.

g:HTMLPanel.pre: <m:MaterialImage resource="{res.image}" type="materialboxed" caption="It is very easy to add a short caption to your photo. Just add the caption as a caption attribute." />

m:MaterialTitle.title: Responsive Videos
m:MaterialTitle.description: We provide a container for Embedded Videos that resizes them responsively.
